review: although doctor doesnt talk much,  first impression of d doctor is dat he is rude...  but r ultimate objective is to get relief & not to be a friend....  i suffered from heal pain for more than 5 years..  went for so many therapies until i met dr deepak sharan...  he cured me in 3 months...  i hv forgotten dat i hd heal pain.... same hpnd wid my tail bone pain...

I went to Dr Deepak with pain in the wrist and arm. He diagnosed it properly in the first visit and recommended physical therapy, which helped me to recover to a large extent. My condition, thoracic outlet syndrome, was not diagnosed by a leading ortho hospital of Bangalore, and as a result it had been aggravating when I visited Dr. Deepak for the first time.
He is very experienced in diagnosing spine and muscle related problems. Unlike other doctors he spends good amount of time in understanding patients problems and cheeks thoroughly. Very nice doctor.

Rude & unprofessional Doctor. Gives an appointment at 5-5:30 pm but doesn't show up regularly till 7-7:30 or sometimes even 8 pm. The queue obviously piles up and the doctor is in hurry to clear as many patients as possible in the least possible time after that. In his haste, doesn't even respond to patient's questions properly * ********** **** ** **** **** ****** ** ***** ***** ***** ********** For my ankle pain, he asked for x-ray, bone density test (3000+) and full blood test (again 3000+) from his own clinic. Physiotherapy again from his own clinic of which I took 14 to 21 sessions without any improvement. Also took vitamin D, calcium etc. for 3 months and other tablets as per his advice without an iota of improvement. Ended up spending more than 10k over his treatment and many long hours of wait. Once on asking about the technique of one of his physiotherapists, was very rudely snubbed saying, "He is the expert not you, don't question". Please stay away from him & all Recoup clinics for your own well being.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor explained the problem the causes and the treatment duration, I had visited another orthopedic where I was suggested for lifetime painkiller,  I was cured in just 10 days of medicine and mayo therapy, it's been years I haven't got back that pain again
